2.name: Espella
2.content: Oh, sorry…... I just...… It'’s shocking… what happened…...

4.content: Now please tell me, do you know the victim?

6.content: He was... he was my boyfriend... years ago...

7.content: He was a reckless driver... One night we were out of town and he ran over someone.

8.content: No one was around so he just drove away and told me not to tell anyone.

9.content: I called the police, and he went to jail. He swore he gonna get me.

12.name: Luke
12.content: I see. And what happened today?

13.name: Espella
13.content: I spent the day with my sister, we came back from... uhh...

15.name: Espella
15.content: right, and when we stepped in, out of nowhere he stormed into the apartment and grabbed me.

16.content: I'm not sure what happened, I heard a thump, a crash and... he was lying there.

17.name: Luke
17.content: Thank you, that's all for now.

10.content: While he carried out his prison sentence, he sent me these letters, threatening me in them...
